This attribute applies when the value of the type attribute is `"text"`, `"search"`, `"tel"`, `"url"`, `"email"`, `"date"`, or `"password"`, otherwise it is ignored. When the type attribute is `"date"`, `pattern` will only be used in browsers that do not support the `"date"` input type natively.
